   36: %%======================================================================
   37: %% Tests
   38: %%======================================================================
   39: 
   40: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: %% Test groups
   42: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: all() ->
   44:     [{group, cpd_tests}, xpath_text1, xpath_main,
   45:      xpath_abbreviated_syntax, xpath_functions, xpath_namespaces,
   46:      {group, misc}, {group, eventp_tests},
   47:      {group, ticket_tests}, {group, app_test},
   48:      {group, appup_test}, {group, format_test}].
   49: 
   50: groups() ->
   51:     [{cpd_tests, [],
   52:       [cpd_invalid1, cpd_invalid1_index, cpd_invalid2_index,
   53:        cpd_invalid_index3, cpd_invalid_is_layer,
   54:        cpd_expl_provided_DTD]},
   55:      {misc, [],
   56:       [latin1_alias, syntax_bug1, syntax_bug2, syntax_bug3,
   57:        pe_ref1, copyright, testXSEIF, export_simple1, export,
   58:        default_attrs_bug, xml_ns, scan_splits_string_bug,
   59:        allow_entities_test]},
   60:      {eventp_tests, [], [sax_parse_and_export]},
   61:      {ticket_tests, [],
   62:       [ticket_5998, ticket_7211, ticket_7214, ticket_7430,
   63:        ticket_6873, ticket_7496, ticket_8156, ticket_8697,
   64:        ticket_9411, ticket_9457, ticket_9664_schema, ticket_9664_dtd]},
   65:      {app_test, [], [{xmerl_app_test, all}]},
   66:      {appup_test, [], [{xmerl_appup_test, all}]},
   67:      {format_test, [], [formatter_pass,formatter_fail]}].
   68: 
   69: suite() ->
   70:     [{timetrap,{minutes,10}}].
   71: 
   72: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: %% Initializations
   74: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: 
   76: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   77:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
   78:     ok=erl_tar:extract("cpd.tar.gz",[compressed]),
   79:     ok=erl_tar:extract("misc.tar.gz",[compressed]),
   80:     ok = change_mode(["cpd", "misc"]),
   81:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
   82:     {ok, xpath_lib} = compile:file(xpath_lib, []),
   83:     {ok, xpath_text} = compile:file(xpath_text, []),
   84:     {ok, xpath_abbrev} = compile:file(xpath_abbrev, []),
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: 
   88: -ifndef(dont_rm_test_dirs).
   89: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   90:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
   91:     ok = rm_files(["cpd", "misc"]),
   92:     ok.
   93: 
   94: -else.
   95: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   96:     ok.
   97: -endif.
   98: 
   99: 
  100: %% initialization before each testcase
  101: init_per_testcase(_TestCase,Config) ->
  102:     io:format("Config:~n~p",[Config]),
  103:     {ok, _} = file:read_file_info(filename:join([privdir(Config)])),
  104:     code:add_patha(privdir(Config)),
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: 
  108: %% clean up after each testcase
  109: end_per_testcase(_Func,_Config) ->
  110:     ok.
  111: 
  112: 
  113: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: %% Test cases
  115: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: cpd_invalid1(Config) ->
  117:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  118:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_test.xml"]),[]) of
  119:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  120:             case Reason of
  121:                 {expected_markup,_Path,28,32} -> ok;
  122:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  123:             end
  124:     end.
  125: 
  126: cpd_invalid1_index(Config) ->
  127:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  128:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_index.xml"]),[]) of
  129:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  130:             case Reason of
  131:                 {{error,{whitespace_was_expected}},_Path,1,19} -> ok;
  132:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  133:             end
  134:     end.
  135: 
  136: cpd_invalid2_index(Config) ->
  137:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  138:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_index2.xml"]),[]) of
  139:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  140:             case Reason of
  141:                 {{invalid_target_name,_Ver},_Path,2,3} ->ok;
  142:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  143:             end
  144:     end.
  145: 
  146: cpd_invalid_index3(Config) ->
  147:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  148:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"cpd_index3.xml"]),[]) of
  149:         {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason}} ->
  150:             case Reason of
  151:                 {expected_markup,_Path,1,2} -> ok;
  152:                 _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  153:             end
  154:     end.
  155: 
  156: cpd_invalid_is_layer(Config) ->
  157:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  158:     case catch xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"is_layer2.xml"]),[]) of
  159:         {'EXIT',{fatal,_Reason}} -> ok
  160:     end.
  161: 
  162: cpd_expl_provided_DTD(Config) ->
  163:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  164:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[cpd,"file_wo_DTD.xml"]),
  165:                                          [{validation,true},{doctype_DTD,"separate_DTD.dtd"}]).
  166: 
  167: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  168: 
  169: xpath_text1(Config) ->
  170:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  171:     ok = xpath_text:one().
  172: 
  173: xpath_main(Config) ->
  174:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  175:     ok = xpath_lib:test().
  176: 
  177: xpath_abbreviated_syntax(Config) ->
  178:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  179:     ok = xpath_abbrev:test().
  180: 
  181: xpath_functions(Config) ->
  182:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  183:     ok = xpath_abbrev:functions().
  184: 
  185: xpath_namespaces(Config) ->
  186:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  187:     ok = xpath_abbrev:namespaces().
  188: 
  189: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  190: 
  191: latin1_alias(Config) ->
  192: %    file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),misc)),
  193:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  194:     {_Elements,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"motorcycles.xml"]),
  195:                                      [{validation,true},
  196:                                       {encoding,'iso-8859-1'}]).
  197: 
  198: syntax_bug1(Config) ->
  199:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  200:     {fatal,{"expected one of: ?>, standalone, encoding",
  201:             {file,'misc/syntax_bug1.xml'},{line,1},{col,21}}
  202:     } = case catch xmerl_scan:file('misc/syntax_bug1.xml') of
  203:             {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  204:                 Reason;
  205:             Err -> Err
  206:         end.
  207: 
  208: syntax_bug2(Config) ->
  209:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  210:     {fatal,{"expected one of: ?>, whitespace_character",
  211:             {file,'misc/syntax_bug2.xml'},{line,1},{col,20}}
  212:     } = case catch xmerl_scan:file('misc/syntax_bug2.xml') of
  213:             {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  214:                 Reason;
  215:             Err -> Err
  216:         end.
  217: 
  218: syntax_bug3(Config) ->
  219:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  220:     {fatal,{{endtag_does_not_match,{was,obj,should_have_been,int}},
  221:             {file,'misc/syntax_bug3.xml'},{line,4},{col,3}}
  222:     } = case catch xmerl_scan:file('misc/syntax_bug3.xml') of
  223:             {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  224:                 Reason;
  225:             Err -> Err
  226:         end.
  227: 
  228: default_attrs_bug(Config) ->
  229:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  230:     Doc = "<!DOCTYPE doc [<!ATTLIST doc b CDATA \"default\">]>\n"
  231:           "<doc a=\"explicit\"/>",
  232:     {#xmlElement{attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = a, value = "explicit"},
  233:                                #xmlAttribute{name = b, value = "default"}]},
  234:      []
  235:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc, [{default_attrs, true}]),
  236:     Doc2 = "<!DOCTYPE doc [<!ATTLIST doc b CDATA \"default\">]>\n"
  237:            "<doc b=\"also explicit\" a=\"explicit\"/>",
  238:     {#xmlElement{attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = b, value = "also explicit"},
  239:                                #xmlAttribute{name = a, value = "explicit"}]},
  240:      []
  241:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc2, [{default_attrs, true}]),
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: 
  245: xml_ns(_Config) ->
  246:     Doc = "<?xml version='1.0'?>\n"
  247:         "<doc xml:attr1=\"implicit xml ns\"/>",
  248:     {#xmlElement{namespace=#xmlNamespace{default = [], nodes = []},
  249:                  attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = 'xml:attr1',
  250:                                              expanded_name = {'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace',attr1},
  251:                                              nsinfo = {"xml","attr1"},
  252:                                              namespace = #xmlNamespace{default = [], nodes = []}}]},
  253:      []
  254:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc, [{namespace_conformant, true}]),
  255:     Doc2 = "<?xml version='1.0'?>\n"
  256:         "<doc xmlns:xml=\"http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace\" xml:attr1=\"explicit xml ns\"/>",
  257:     {#xmlElement{namespace=#xmlNamespace{default = [], nodes = [{"xml",'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'}]},
  258:                  attributes = [#xmlAttribute{name = 'xmlns:xml',
  259:                                              expanded_name = {"xmlns","xml"},
  260:                                              nsinfo = {"xmlns","xml"},
  261:                                              namespace = #xmlNamespace{default = [],
  262:                                                                        nodes = [{"xml",'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'}]}},
  263:                                #xmlAttribute{name = 'xml:attr1',
  264:                                              expanded_name = {'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace',attr1},
  265:                                              nsinfo = {"xml","attr1"},
  266:                                              namespace = #xmlNamespace{default = [],
  267:                                                                        nodes = [{"xml",'http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'}]}}]},
  268:      []
  269:     } = xmerl_scan:string(Doc2, [{namespace_conformant, true}]),
  270:     ok.
  271: 
  272: scan_splits_string_bug(_Config) ->
  273:     {#xmlElement{ content = [#xmlText{ value = "Jimmy Zöger" }] }, []}
  274:         = xmerl_scan:string("<name>Jimmy Z&#246;ger</name>").
  275: 
  276: pe_ref1(Config) ->
  277:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  278:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"PE_ref1.xml"]),
  279:                                          [{allow_entities, true}, {validation,true}]).
  280: 
  281: copyright(Config) ->
  282:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  283:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"cprght.xml"]),[{validation,true}]).
  284: 
  285: testXSEIF(Config) ->
  286:     file:set_cwd(datadir(Config)),
  287:     {#xmlElement{},[]} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ReplBoard_1_1543-CNA11313Uen.xml"]),
  288:                                          [{allow_entities, true}, {validation,true}]).
  289: 
  290: export_simple1(_Config) ->
  291:     Simple = simple(),
  292:     Res = xmerl:export_simple(Simple,xmerl_xml,[{title, "Doc Title"}]),
  293:     "<?xml version="++_ = lists:flatten(Res),
  294: 
  295:     %% Use of fun in simple content OTP-6679
  296:     Simple2 = simple2(),
  297:     Res2 = xmerl:export_simple(Simple2,xmerl_xml,[{title,"Doc Title"}]),
  298:     true = (Res2 =:= Res),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: export(Config) ->
  302:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  303:     Prolog = ["<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>\n<!DOCTYPE motorcycles SYSTEM \"motorcycles.dtd\">\n"],
  304:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir,"misc","motorcycles.xml"]),
  305:     {E,_} = xmerl_scan:file(TestFile),
  306:     Exported = xmerl:export([E],xmerl_xml,[{prolog,Prolog}]),
  307:     B = list_to_binary(Exported++"\n"),
  308:     {ok, B} = file:read_file(TestFile),
  309:     ok.
  310: 
  311: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  312: 
  313: sax_parse_and_export(Config) ->
  314:     ok = sax_parse_export_xml_big(Config),
  315:     ok = sax_parse_export_xml_small(Config).
  316: 
  317: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  318: 
  319: sax_parse_export_xml_big(Config) ->
  320:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  321:     OutDir = privdir(Config),
  322:     io:format("DataDir: ~p~n,OutDir:~p~n",[DataDir,OutDir]),
  323:     CMOMxml = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","CMOM.xml"]),
  324:     {Ex,[]} = xmerl_eventp:file_sax(CMOMxml, xmerl_xml,[],[{allow_entities, true}]),
  325:     OutFile = filename:join([OutDir,"cmom"]),
  326:     file:delete(OutFile),
  327:     StubFile = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","CelloMOM.stub"]),
  328:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(StubFile),
  329:     {ok,IO} = file:open(OutFile,[write,append]),
  330:     ok = file:write(IO,Bin),
  331:     ok = io:format(IO,"~s~n~n",[lists:flatten(Ex)]),
  332:     ok = file:close(IO),
  333:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  334:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(CMOMxml),
  335:     ok.
  336: 
  337: sax_parse_export_xml_small(Config) ->
  338:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  339:     OutDir = privdir(Config),
  340:     Wurfl_xml = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","wurfl.xml"]),
  341:     {Ex,[]} = xmerl_eventp:file_sax(Wurfl_xml, xmerl_xml,[],[{allow_entities, true}]),
  342:     OutFile = filename:join([OutDir,"wrfl"]),
  343:     file:delete(OutFile),
  344:     StubFile = filename:join([DataDir,"eventp","wurfl.stub"]),
  345:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(StubFile),
  346:     {ok,IO} = file:open(OutFile,[write,append]),
  347:     ok = file:write(IO,Bin),
  348:     ok = io:format(IO,"~s~n",[lists:flatten(Ex)]),
  349:     ok = file:close(IO),
  350:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  351:     {ok,CmpBin1} = file:read_file(Wurfl_xml),
  352:     ok.
  353: 
  354: simple() ->
  355:     [{document,
  356:       [{title, "Doc Title"}, {author, "Ulf Wiger"}],
  357:       [{section,
  358: 	[{heading, "heading1"}],
  359: 	[{'P', ["This is a paragraph of text."]},
  360: 	 {section,
  361: 	  [{heading, "heading2"}],
  362: 	  [{'P', ["This is another paragraph."]},
  363: 	   {table,
  364: 	    [{border, 1}],
  365: 	    [{heading,
  366: 	      [{col, ["head1"]},
  367: 	       {col, ["head2"]}]},
  368: 	     {row,
  369: 	      [{col, ["col11"]},
  370: 	       {col, ["col12"]}]},
  371: 	     {row,
  372: 	      [{col, ["col21"]},
  373: 	       {col, ["col22"]}]}]}]}]}]}].
  374: 
  375: 
  376: simple2() ->
  377:     GenC = fun ?MODULE:generate_section/1,
  378:     GenA = fun ?MODULE:generate_attr_title/1,
  379:     [{document,[{GenA,2}],[{GenC,1}]}].
  380: 
  381: generate_attr_title(0) ->
  382:     done;
  383: generate_attr_title(1) ->
  384:     {{title,"Doc Title"},0};
  385: generate_attr_title(2) ->
  386:     {{author, "Ulf Wiger"},1}.
  387: generate_section(0) ->
  388:     done;
  389: generate_section(N) ->
  390:     GenC = fun ?MODULE:generate_section_content/1,
  391:     GenA = fun ?MODULE:generate_section_attribute/1,
  392:     {{section,[{GenA,1}],[{GenC,2}]},N-1}.
  393: 
  394: generate_section_attribute(0) ->
  395:     done;
  396: generate_section_attribute(N) ->
  397:     {{heading, "heading1"},N-1}.
  398: 
  399: 
  400: generate_subsection_content(0) ->
  401:     done;
  402: generate_subsection_content(1) ->
  403:     {{'P',["This is another paragraph."]},0};
  404: generate_subsection_content(N) ->
  405:     {{table,[{fun ?MODULE:generate_border_attribute/1,1}],
  406:       [{fun ?MODULE:generate_table_content/1,2}]},N-1}.
  407: generate_section_content(0) ->
  408:     done;
  409: generate_section_content(1) ->
  410:     {{'P',["This is a paragraph of text."]},0};
  411: generate_section_content(N) ->
  412:     {{section,[{heading,"heading2"}],
  413:       [{fun ?MODULE:generate_subsection_content/1,2}]},N-1}.
  414: generate_border_attribute(0) ->
  415:     done;
  416: generate_border_attribute(N) ->
  417:     {{border,N},N-1}.
  418: generate_table_content(0) ->
  419:     done;
  420: generate_table_content(1) ->
  421:     {{fun ?MODULE:generate_heading/1,1},0};
  422: generate_table_content(N) ->
  423:     {{fun ?MODULE:generate_row/1, {2,2}},N-1}.
  424: generate_row({0,_}) ->
  425:     done;
  426: generate_row(N) ->
  427:     UpdateS = fun({2,_}) -> {1,2};(_) -> {0,0} end,
  428:     {{row,[{fun ?MODULE:generate_row_col/1, N}]},UpdateS(N)}.
  429: generate_row_col({_,0}) ->
  430:     done;
  431: generate_row_col(N={C,R}) ->
  432:     UpdateS = fun({X,Y}) -> {X,Y-1} end,
  433:     {{col,[lists:concat(["col",C,R])]},UpdateS(N)}.
  434: generate_heading(0) ->
  435:     done;
  436: generate_heading(N) ->
  437:     {{heading,[{fun ?MODULE:generate_heading_col/1,2}]},N-1}.
  438: generate_heading_col(0) ->
  439:     done;
  440: generate_heading_col(N) ->
  441:     {{col,[lists:concat(["head",N])]},N-1}.
  442: 
  443: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  444: %% Ticket Tests
  445: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  446: 
  447: %%
  448: %% ticket_5998
  449: %%
  450: %% A Kleene Closure child in a sequence consumed all following
  451: %% child's. This problem has been fixed.
  452: %%
  453: ticket_5998(Config) ->
  454:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  455:     %% First fix is tested by case syntax_bug2.
  456: 
  457:     ok =
  458:         case catch xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"ticket_5998_2.xml"])) of
  459:             {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason1}} ->
  460:                 case Reason1 of
  461:                     {{endtag_does_not_match,
  462:                       {was,obj,should_have_been,int}},
  463:                      _,_,_} -> ok;
  464:                     _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  465:                 end
  466:         end,
  467: 
  468:     ok =
  469:         case catch xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"ticket_5998_3.xml"])) of
  470:             {'EXIT',{fatal,Reason2}} ->
  471:                 case Reason2 of
  472:                     {"expected one of: ?>, standalone, encoding",
  473:                      _,_,_} -> ok;
  474:                     _ -> {comment,"parsing changed behaviour"}
  475:                 end
  476:         end.
  477: 
  478: 
  479: %%
  480: %% ticket_7211
  481: %%
  482: %% A Kleene Closure child in a sequence consumed all following
  483: %% child's. This problem has been fixed.
  484: %%
  485: ticket_7211(Config) ->
  486:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  487:     {E,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"notes2.xml"]),
  488:                              [{fetch_path,[filename:join([DataDir,misc,erlang_docs_dtd])]},
  489:                               {allow_entities, true}, {validation,dtd}]),
  490: 
  491:     ok = case E of
  492:              Rec when is_record(Rec,xmlElement) ->
  493:                  ok;
  494:              _ ->
  495:                  E
  496:          end,
  497: 
  498:     {E2,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,"XS.xml"]),
  499:                               [{fetch_path,[filename:join([DataDir,misc,erlang_docs_dtd])]},
  500:                                {validation,dtd}, {allow_entities, true}]),
  501: 
  502:     ok = case E2 of
  503:              Rec2 when is_record(Rec2,xmlElement) ->
  504:                  ok;
  505:              _ ->
  506:                  E2
  507:          end.
  508: 
  509: %%
  510: %% ticket_7214
  511: %%
  512: %% Now validating xhtml1-transitional.dtd.
  513: %% A certain contentspec with a succeeding choice, that didn't match
  514: %% all content, followed by other child elements caused a
  515: %% failure. This is now corrected.
  516: %%
  517: ticket_7214(Config) ->
  518:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  519: 
  520:     {E,[]} = xmerl_scan:file(filename:join([DataDir,misc,'block_tags.html']),
  521:                              [{validation,dtd},{allow_entities, true},
  522:                               {fetch_path,[filename:join([DataDir,misc,erlang_docs_dtd])]}]),
  523: 
  524:     ok = case E of
  525:              Rec when is_record(Rec,xmlElement) ->
  526:                  ok;
  527:              _ ->
  528:                  E
  529:          end.
  530: 
  531: %%
  532: %% ticket_7430
  533: %%
  534: %% Problem with contents of numeric character references followed by
  535: %% UTF-8 characters..
  536: %%
  537: ticket_7430(_Config) ->
  538:     %%DataDir = datadir(Config),
  539: 
  540:     {E,[]} = xmerl_scan:string("<a>\303\251&#xD;\303\251</a>",[{encoding,'utf-8'}]),
  541: 
  542:     ok = case E of
  543:              {xmlElement,a,a,[],
  544:               {xmlNamespace,[],[]},
  545:               [],1,[],
  546:               [{xmlText,[{a,1}],1,[],"é\né",text}],
  547:               [],_,undeclared} ->
  548:                  ok;
  549:              _ ->
  550:                  E
  551:          end.
  552: 
  553: ticket_6873(Config) ->
  554:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  555:     ok = xpath_abbrev:ticket_6873(),
  556:     ok = xpath_lib:ticket_6873().
  557: 
  558: ticket_7496(Config) ->
  559:     file:set_cwd(filename:join(datadir(Config),xpath)),
  560:     ok = xpath_abbrev:ticket_7496().
  561: 
  562: ticket_8156(_Config) ->
  563:     {ftp,{[],[]},"testmachine1",21,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://testmachine1/w.erl"),
  564:     {ftp,{"user",[]},"testmachine1",21,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://user@testmachine1/w.erl"),
  565:     {ftp,{"user","hello"},"testmachine1",21,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://user:hello@testmachine1/w.erl"),
  566:     {ftp,{[],[]},"testmachine1",3000,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://testmachine1:3000/w.erl"),
  567:     {ftp,{"user","hello"},"testmachine1",3000,"/w.erl"} = xmerl_uri:parse("ftp://user:hello@testmachine1:3000/w.erl"),
  568:     ok.
  569: 
  570: %% Test that xmerl_scan can decode unicode entities properly
  571: ticket_8697(_Config) ->
  572:     {UTF8Output, []} = xmerl_scan:string("<?xml version=\"1\" ?>\n<text>" ++ [229, 145, 156] ++ "</text>"),
  573:     #xmlElement{content = [#xmlText{value = UTF8Text}]} = UTF8Output,
  574:     [16#545C] = UTF8Text,
  575:     {DecEntityOutput, []} = xmerl_scan:string("<?xml version=\"1\" ?>\n<text>&#21596;</text>"),
  576:     #xmlElement{content = [#xmlText{value = DecEntityText}]} = DecEntityOutput,
  577:     [21596] = DecEntityText,
  578:     {HexEntityOutput, []} = xmerl_scan:string("<?xml version=\"1\" ?>\n<text>&#x545C;</text>"),
  579:     #xmlElement{content = [#xmlText{value = HexEntityText}]} = HexEntityOutput,
  580:     [16#545C] = HexEntityText,
  581:     ok.
  582: 
  583: %% Test that xmerl_scan handles attribute that contains for example &quot
  584: ticket_9411(Config) ->
  585:     DataDir = datadir(Config),
  586: 
  587:     {ok, Schema} = xmerl_xsd:process_schema(filename:join([DataDir,"misc/ticket_9411.xsd"])),
  588:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join([DataDir,"misc/ticket_9411.xml"])),
  589:     Xml = erlang:binary_to_list(Bin),
  590:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:string(Xml),
  591:     {E, _} = xmerl_xsd:validate(E, Schema).
  592: 
  593: %% Test that xmerl_scan handles continuation correct when current input runs out at the end of an attribute value
  594: ticket_9457(_Config) ->
  595:     Opts = [{continuation_fun, fun ticket_9457_cont/3, start}, {space, normalize}],
  596:     {_E, _} = xmerl_scan:string([], Opts).
  597: 
  598: ticket_9457_cont(Continue, Exception, GlobalState) ->
  599:     case xmerl_scan:cont_state(GlobalState) of
  600: 	start ->
  601: 	    G1 = xmerl_scan:cont_state(next, GlobalState),
  602: 	    Bytes = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>\r\n<item a=\"b\"",
  603: 	    Continue(Bytes, G1);
  604: 	next ->
  605: 	    G1 = xmerl_scan:cont_state(last, GlobalState),
  606: 	    Bytes = ">blah</item>\r\n",
  607: 	    Continue(Bytes, G1);
  608: 	_ ->
  609: 	    Exception(GlobalState)
  610:     end.
  611: 
  612: 
  613: %% Test that comments are handled correct with
  614: ticket_9664_schema(Config) ->
  615:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_schema.xml"]),[]),
  616:     {ok, S} = xmerl_xsd:process_schema(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"motorcycles.xsd"])),
  617:     {E1, _} = xmerl_xsd:validate(E, S),
  618: 
  619:     {E1,_} = xmerl_xsd:process_validate(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"motorcycles.xsd"]),E,[]),
  620: 
  621:     {E1,_} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_schema.xml"]),
  622:                              [{schemaLocation, [{"mc", "motorcycles.xsd"}]},
  623:                               {validation, schema}]),
  624:     ok.
  625: 
  626: %% Test that comments are handled correct with
  627: ticket_9664_dtd(Config) ->
  628:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_dtd.xml"]),[]),
  629:     {E, _} = xmerl_scan:file(datadir_join(Config,[misc,"ticket_9664_dtd.xml"]),[{validation, true}]),
  630:     ok.
  631: 
  632: 
  633: allow_entities_test(Config) ->
  634:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  635:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "lol_1_test.xml"), %% Depth 9
  636:     %% Disallow entities
  637:     {'EXIT',{fatal, {{error,entities_not_allowed}, _, _, _}}} =
  638:         (catch xmerl_scan:file(File, [{allow_entities, false}])),
  639:     ok.
  640: 
  641: 
  642: %%======================================================================
  643: %% Support Functions
  644: %%======================================================================
  645: 
  646: %% Dir is a directory
  647: rm_f_(Dir) ->
  648:     {ok,CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
  649:     {ok,FileList} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  650:     file:set_cwd(filename:join([CWD,Dir])),
  651:     rm_files(FileList),
  652:     file:set_cwd(CWD),
  653:     ? line ok = file:del_dir(Dir).
  654: 
  655: rm_files([])->
  656:     ok;
  657: rm_files([F|Fs]) ->
  658:     case filelib:is_dir(F) of
  659: 	true ->
  660: 	    rm_f_(F);
  661: 	_ ->
  662: 	    ok = file:delete(F)
  663:     end,
  664:     rm_files(Fs).
  665: 
  666: change_mode(Files) ->
  667:     change_mode3(Files).
  668: change_mode2(Dir)->
  669:     {ok,CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
  670:     {ok,FileList} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  671:     file:set_cwd(filename:join([CWD,Dir])),
  672:     change_mode3(FileList),
  673:     file:set_cwd(CWD).
  674: change_mode3([]) ->
  675:     ok;
  676: change_mode3([F|Fs]) ->
  677:     case filelib:is_dir(F) of
  678:         true ->
  679:             chmod(F),
  680:             change_mode2(F);
  681:         _ ->
  682:             chmod(F)
  683:     end,
  684:     change_mode3(Fs).
  685: 
  686: chmod(F) ->
  687:     case file:read_file_info(F) of
  688: 	{ok,FileInfo} ->
  689: 	    Mode= FileInfo#file_info.mode,
  690: 	    file:write_file_info(F,FileInfo#file_info{mode=8#00777 bor Mode});
  691: 	_ ->
  692: 	    ok
  693:     end.
  694: 
  695: privdir(Config) ->
  696:     proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config).
  697: datadir(Config) ->
  698:     proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config).
  699: 
  700: datadir_join(Config,Files) ->
  701:     filename:join([datadir(Config)|Files]).
  702: 
  703: %%======================================================================
  704: %% New formatter tests input/output
  705: %%======================================================================
  706: 
  707: html() ->
  708:     "<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN\" \"DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd\"><html>"
  709:     "<head><title>Doc Title</title><author>Ulf Wiger</author></head>"
  710:     "<h1>heading1</h1>"
  711:     "<p>This is a paragraph of text.</p>"
  712:     "<h2>heading2</h2>"
  713:     "<p>This is another paragraph.</p>"
  714:     "<table>"
  715:     "<thead><tr><td>head1</td><td>head2</td></tr></thead>"
  716:     "<tr><td>col11</td><td>col122</td></tr>"
  717:     "<tr><td>col21</td><td>col122</td></tr>"
  718:     "</table>"
  719:     "</html>".
  720: 
  721: html_indented() ->
  722:     "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
  723:     "\n<html>"
  724:     "\n  <head>"
  725:     "\n    <title>Doc Title</title>"
  726:     "\n    <author>Ulf Wiger</author>"
  727:     "\n  </head>"
  728:     "\n  <h1>heading1</h1>"
  729:     "\n  <p>This is a paragraph of text.</p>"
  730:     "\n  <h2>heading2</h2>"
  731:     "\n  <p>This is another paragraph.</p>"
  732:     "\n  <table>"
  733:     "\n    <thead>"
  734:     "\n      <tr>"
  735:     "\n        <td>head1</td>"
  736:     "\n        <td>head2</td>"
  737:     "\n      </tr>"
  738:     "\n    </thead>"
  739:     "\n    <tr>"
  740:     "\n      <td>col11</td>"
  741:     "\n      <td>col122</td>"
  742:     "\n    </tr>"
  743:     "\n    <tr>"
  744:     "\n      <td>col21</td>"
  745:     "\n      <td>col122</td>"
  746:     "\n    </tr>"
  747:     "\n  </table>"
  748:     "\n</html>".
  749: 
  750: xml_namespace() ->
  751:     "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
  752:     "<!-- initially, the default namespace is \"books\" -->"
  753:     "<book xmlns='urn:loc.gov:books' xmlns:isbn='urn:ISBN:0-395-36341-6'>"
  754:     "<title>Cheaper by the Dozen</title>"
  755:     "<isbn:number>1568491379</isbn:number>"
  756:     "<notes>"
  757:     "<!-- make HTML the default namespace for some comments -->"
  758:     "<p xmlns='urn:w3-org-ns:HTML'>"
  759:     "This is a <i>funny</i> book!"
  760:     "</p>"
  761:     "</notes>"
  762:     "</book>".
  763: 
  764: xml_namespace_indented() ->
  765:   "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
  766:   "\n<book xmlns=\"urn:loc.gov:books\" xmlns:isbn=\"urn:ISBN:0-395-36341-6\">"
  767:   "\n  <title>Cheaper by the Dozen</title>"
  768:   "\n  <isbn:number>1568491379</isbn:number>"
  769:   "\n  <notes>"
  770:   "\n    <p xmlns=\"urn:w3-org-ns:HTML\">This is a <i>funny</i> book!</p>"
  771:   "\n  </notes>"
  772:   "\n</book>".
  773: 
  774: output_element_to_str(E) ->
  775:     Output = xmerl:export([E], xmerl_xml_indent),
  776:     [Str] = io_lib:format("~s", [lists:flatten(Output)]),
  777:     Str.
  778: 
  779: %%======================================================================
  780: %% New formatter tests
  781: %%======================================================================
  782: formatter_pass(_Config) ->
  783: 
  784:     FetchFun = fun(_DTDSpec, S) -> {ok, not_fetched, S} end,
  785:     %% Generate based on namespace-example
  786:     {Ns, _} = xmerl_scan:string(xml_namespace(), [{fetch_fun, FetchFun}]),
  787:     GNs = output_element_to_str(Ns),
  788:     INs = xml_namespace_indented(),
  789:     INs = GNs,
  790: 
  791:     %% Generate based on html-example
  792:     {Html, _} = xmerl_scan:string(html(), [{fetch_fun, FetchFun}]),
  793:     GHtml = output_element_to_str(Html),
  794:     IHtml = html_indented(),
  795:     GHtml = IHtml,
  796:     ok.
  797: 
  798: formatter_fail(_Config) ->
  799:     ok.
